Sentencas: An integrated system including solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC)-gas turbine power plant and further combine this two equipment with electrochemical conversion of carbon dioxide (CO2) to ethanol is presented and analyzed.
Titulo: Investigation of an electrochemical conversion of carbon dioxide to ethanol and solid oxide fuel cell, gas turbine hybrid process

Sentencas: In this operation, heat, power and ethanol (as a fuel) are produced.
Titulo: Investigation of an electrochemical conversion of carbon dioxide to ethanol and solid oxide fuel cell, gas turbine hybrid process

Sentencas: Analyses of energy and exergy achieved along with cells potential and efficiency of total system.
Titulo: Investigation of an electrochemical conversion of carbon dioxide to ethanol and solid oxide fuel cell, gas turbine hybrid process

Sentencas: The developed SOFC electrochemical model and conversion of CO2 to ethanol is validated with other studies.
Titulo: Investigation of an electrochemical conversion of carbon dioxide to ethanol and solid oxide fuel cell, gas turbine hybrid process

Sentencas: Main parameters and thermodynamic package of combined system are analyzed.
Titulo: Investigation of an electrochemical conversion of carbon dioxide to ethanol and solid oxide fuel cell, gas turbine hybrid process

Sentencas: The system net power is calculated to be 491.3 kW. Results demonstrated that electrical efficiency without parametric study in best situation was 63%.
Titulo: Investigation of an electrochemical conversion of carbon dioxide to ethanol and solid oxide fuel cell, gas turbine hybrid process

Sentencas: The power of gas turbine and heat recovery were obtained 121 kW and 14.8 kW, respectively.
Titulo: Investigation of an electrochemical conversion of carbon dioxide to ethanol and solid oxide fuel cell, gas turbine hybrid process

Sentencas: According to cell polarization curve, the maximum power density of SOFC occurred in 1.6 A per square centimeter.
Titulo: Investigation of an electrochemical conversion of carbon dioxide to ethanol and solid oxide fuel cell, gas turbine hybrid process

Sentencas: Electrochemical conversion of CO2 to ethanol (ECCE) with 89.9% exergy efficiency has high efficiency compared with other components.
Titulo: Investigation of an electrochemical conversion of carbon dioxide to ethanol and solid oxide fuel cell, gas turbine hybrid process

Sentencas: With this research conditions, ECCE produced 23.4 kW net power (5.3% of the overall power production) that with the presence of ECCE the total efficiency of hybrid system increased 4.8% compared to its absence.
Titulo: Investigation of an electrochemical conversion of carbon dioxide to ethanol and solid oxide fuel cell, gas turbine hybrid process

Sentencas: In parametric study, results showed that overall efficiency and electrical efficiency can reach 72.5% and 66.5% respectively.
Titulo: Investigation of an electrochemical conversion of carbon dioxide to ethanol and solid oxide fuel cell, gas turbine hybrid process

Sentencas: Also the reformer temperature and after that the fuel utilization have most impacts on the electrical efficiency.(c) 2021
